items.text: Detail-oriented and adaptable IT student with strong skills in Java, C#(.NET), and SQL. Gained hands-on experience during a software development internship, including data management and working in agile teams. Known for analytical thinking, precision, and a strong work ethic, supported by prior experience in healthcare and volunteering. Eager to apply my back-end and database knowledge to real-world software solutions.

details: Assisted in developing a website feature using Angular, organized business data in Excel, and participated in daily team meetings.
Gained exposure to real-world development workflows and agile collaboration.
Marked practical assignments, assisted students with their practical work, and supervised tests during the Introduction to Programming course.
Gained experience in assessment, student support, and exam supervision within an educational setting.
Filled prescriptions and restocked medications as part of a practical pharmacy project.
Gained experience working with precision and following strict procedures in a regulated healthcare environment.
Assisted customers by answering questions and selling toys at a stall during the annual Liggiefees event, providing friendly and helpful service to visitors.
Gained valuable experience in customer service, communication, and sales in a busy event environment.
